<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Agonizing Rebuke](/Feats.aspx?ID=1030) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 50 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

When you terrorize your enemies, you also cause them painful mental distress. When you successfully [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a foe, that foe takes 1d4 mental damage at the start of each of its turns as long as it remains [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) and continues to engage in combat with you. If you have master proficiency in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), the damage increases to 2d4, and if you have legendary proficiency, the damage increases to 3d4.
name: Agonizing Rebuke
